relatedGuides.name: How bookings are confirmed or declined

permissions.name: Manage Bookings
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change the site's bookings, schedules, sessions, services and resources, including site owner data, staff member data, and participant data.

params.name: bookingId
params.doc: ID of the booking to confirm or decline.

params.name: paymentStatus
params.doc: Current payment status of the booking.

docs.summary:
Use `Confirm Or Decline Booking` to determine if the booking is valid, payment is received, and the booking can be processed.  
Call `Confirm Or Decline Booking` after checkout or after calling `Create Booking` to verify the booking.

+ If a session is valid and payment is received, the booking is visible on the calendar.    
+ If a session is double booked, `Confirm Or Decline Booking` can catch this and decline the duplicate booking, the booking is not visible on the calendar.

examples.title: Try to confirm a paid booking

extra.description: Booking is confirmed as the value of `status` is confirmed

examples.title: Try to confirm an unpaid, double booking

extra.description: Confirming this booking would result in a double booking and there is no payment, so the booking the `status` is declined.

examples.title: Try to confirm an already-confirmed booking

members.name: country
members.doc: Country code.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Zip/postal code.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: A string containing the full address of this location.

members.name: hint
members.doc: Free text to help find the address.

members.name: geocode
members.doc: Coordinates of the physical address.

members.name: countryFullname
members.doc: Country full name.

members.name: subdivisions
members.doc: Multi-level subdivisions from top to bottom.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street name, number and apartment number.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: code
members.doc: Subdivision code. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: name
members.doc: Subdivision full name.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: apt
members.doc: Apartment number.

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Address latitude.

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Address longitude.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the form field as defined in the form.

members.name: value
members.doc: Value that was submitted for this field.

members.name: label
members.doc: Form field's label at the time of submission.

members.name: valueType
members.doc:
<!--ONLY:VELO
One of:
 - `"SHORT_TEXT"`
 - `"LONG_TEXT"`
 - `"CHECK_BOX"`
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact's ID.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Contact's first name. When populated from a standard booking form, this property corresponds to the **Name** field.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Contact's last name.

members.name: email
members.doc: Contact's email, used to create a new contact or get existing one from the [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts). Used to validate coupon usage limitations per contact. If not passed, the coupon usage limitation will not be enforced. (Coupon usage limitation validation is not supported yet).

members.name: phone
members.doc: Contact's phone number.

members.name: fullAddress
members.doc: Contact's full address.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Contact's time zone.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Contact's country in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: platform
members.doc:
Platform from which a booking was created
<!--ONLY:VELO
 One of:
 - `"WEB"` Desktop browser.
 - `"MOBILE_APP"` Mobile application.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: actor
members.doc:
Actor that created this booking.
<!--ONLY:VELO
One of:
 - `"BUSINESS"`
 - `"CUSTOMER"`
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: Wix site ID of the application that created the booking.

members.name: appName
members.doc: Name of the application that created the booking, as saved in Wix Developers Center at the time of booking.

members.name: optionId
members.doc:
ID of the corresponding option for the choice. For example, the choice `child`
 could correspond to the option `ageGroup`. In this case, `optionId` is the ID 
 for the `ageGroup` option.

members.name: custom
members.doc:
Value for one of the choices in the [`CustomServiceOption.choices`](https://example.com) list. 
 Choices are specific values for an option the customer can choose to book. For example, 
 the option `ageGroup` may have these choices: `child`, `student`, `adult`, and `senior`. 
 Each choice may have a different price.

members.name: id
members.doc:
Business location ID. Available only for locations that are business locations, 
 meaning the `location_type` is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location name.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: The full address of this location.

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Location type.
 
 - `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`: The business address, as set in the site’s general settings.
 - `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`: The address as set when creating the service.
 - `"CUSTOM"`: The address as set for the individual session.

members.name: notifyParticipants
members.doc:
Whether to send the message about the changes to the customer.

Default: `false`

members.name: message
members.doc: Custom message to send to the participants about the changes to the booking.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of of a contact in the site's [CRM by Ascend](https://www.wix.com/ascend/crm) system.

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app.

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs.  Data Extensions extended fields
Key: Namespace
Value: extended fields data in Struct format

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type struct

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.  Data Extensions extended fields
Key: Namespace
Value: extended fields data in Struct format

members.name: skipAvailabilityValidation
members.doc:
When true, skips availability checking and allows booking.
 Requires BOOKINGS.OVERRIDE_AVAILABILITY permissions.

members.name: skipBusinessConfirmation
members.doc:
When true, allows booking a confirmation-required service without requiring confirmation.
 Requires BOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY permissions.

members.name: skipSelectedPaymentOptionValidation
members.doc:
When true, skips selected payment option checking as defined in `selectedPaymentOption` field
 and allows booking.
 Requires BOOKINGS.MANAGE_PAYMENTS permissions.

members.name: withRefund
members.doc: When true, refunds the booking's payment when the booking is canceled.

members.name: id
members.doc: Booking ID.

members.name: bookedEntity
members.doc: An object describing the slot or schedule that was booked.

members.name: contactDetails
members.doc: Contact details of the site visitor or member making the booking.

members.name: additionalFields
members.doc: Additional custom fields submitted with the booking form.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Booking status.
 One of:
 - `"CREATED"` - The booking was created.
 - `"UPDATED"` - The booking was updated.
 - `"CONFIRMED"` - The booking was confirmed and appears on the bookings calendar.
    A booking can be manually confirmed using the [`Confirm Or Decline API`](www.example.com).
    A booking can be automatically confirmed when the following requirements are met:
    + The service is configured as automatically confirmed.
    + The system invoked the eCommerce checkout API and created an order.
 - `"CANCELED"` - The booking has been canceled and synced to the bookings calendar.
    The booking can be canceled using [`Cancel Booking API`](www.example.com).
 - `"PENDING"` - The booking is waiting to be confirmed or declined by the owner and the booking is synced to the bookings calendar.
    Bookings can be manually set as `PENDING` using the [`setAsPending` API](www.example.com), by those with Manage Booking Status permissions scopes.
    Bookings can be automatically set as `PENDING` when the following requirements are met:
    + The service is configured as manually confirmed.
    + Invoking the eCommerce checkout API and an order has been created.
 - `"WAITING_LIST"` - The booking is on a waiting list.
 - `"DECLINED"` - The booking was declined by the owner and synced to the Bookings calendar.
    Bookings can be manually declined using the [`Decline Booking` API](www.example.com) by those with Manage Booking Status permissions scopes.
    Booking can be automatically declined when one of the following requirements are met:
    + Invoking the `eCommerce checkout` API and the order declined event has been sent.
    + Invoking the `eCommerce checkout` API and order approved event has been sent, but the booking is offline and the booking causes a double booking.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Payment status.
 One of:
 - `"NOT_PAID"` The booking is not paid for.
 - `"PAID"` The booking is fully paid.
 - `"PARTIALLY_PAID"` The booking is partially paid.
 - `"REFUNDED"` The booking is refunded.

members.name: selectedPaymentOption
members.doc:
Selected payment option.  
 One of the payment options offered by the service, or another option if `skipSelectedPaymentOptionValidation` is `true`.
 When undefined, the payment option is resolved by the service configuration on checkout.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the booking was created.

members.name: externalUserId
members.doc: External ID provided by the client app on creation.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number to be used when updating, rescheduling, or cancelling the booking. Revision number, which increments by 1 each time the booking is updated, rescheduled, or canceled. To prevent conflicting changes,the current revision must be passed when updating the booking.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc:
ID of the creator of the Booking.
If `appId` and another ID are present, the other ID takes precedence.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: The start date of this booking. For a slot, this is the start date of the slot. For a schedule, this is the start date of the first session.

members.name: endDate
members.doc: The end date of this booking. For a slot, this is the end date of the slot. For a schedule, this is the end date of the last session.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the booking was updated.

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc:
Additional custom fields. This includes fields managed by Wix, by 3rd-party apps, and by the site.

Empty fields are not returned.

members.name: doubleBooked
members.doc: Whether this booking overlaps another existing confirmed booking. Returned when: `true`

members.name: participantsInfo
members.doc: Info of participants - either the total number of participants for fixed/custom pricing or the service choices and their respective number of participants. Replaces number_of_participants

members.name: totalParticipants
members.doc: Total number of participants. Available only when the booking includes a single service variant.

members.name: participantsChoices
members.doc:
Information about the booked service choices and participants. 
Available only when the booking includes multiple service variants.

members.name: serviceChoices
members.doc: Information about the booked service choices. Includes the number of participants.

members.name: item
members.doc: Bookable item.

members.name: title
members.doc: Session title at the time of booking.

members.name: tags
members.doc:
List of tags for the booking.  
 System-assigned tags for sessions and schedules are:
 + "INDIVIDUAL" Appointments, including appointments with more than 1 participant.
 + "GROUP" Individual classes.
 + "COURSE" Courses.

members.name: slot
members.doc: The booked slot, once booked becomes a session, The booking is automatically assigned to the session if it already exists, or creates a session if one doesn't already exist.

members.name: schedule
members.doc: The booked schedule. The booking is automatically assigned to the schedule's sessions.

members.name: sessionId
members.doc:
ID of the underlying session when session is a single session or generated from a recurring session.
 If `sessionId` is defined in the `Create Booking` request, the `startDate`, `endDate`, `timezone`, `resource`, and `location` fields are ignored and populated from the existing session's information.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID. Required.

members.name: startDate
members.doc:
The start time of this slot in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339)
 format. Required.

members.name: endDate
members.doc:
The end time of this slot in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339)
 format. Required.

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone according to which the slot was shown to the user when booking, and should be shown in future.

members.name: resource
members.doc: The resource assigned to the slot.

members.name: location
members.doc: Location where the slot's session takes place.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Booked service ID.

members.name: location
members.doc: Location where the schedule's sessions take place. Read only.

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone according to which the slot was shown to the user when booking, and should be shown in future.

members.name: firstSessionStart
members.doc:
The start time of the first session in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339)
 format. Required.

members.name: lastSessionEnd
members.doc:
The end time of the last session in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339)
 format. Required.

members.name: id
members.doc: Booked resource ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource's name at the time of booking.

members.name: email
members.doc: Resource's email at the time of booking.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Resource's schedule ID.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Number of participants for this variant.

members.name: choices
members.doc: Service choices for these participants.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_bookings_confirmator_v2_ConfirmOrDeclineBookingRequest
messages.displayName: Confirm Or Decline Booking Request Object

members.name: bookingId
members.doc: ID of the booking to confirm or decline.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc: Current payment status of the booking.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_bookings_confirmator_v2_ConfirmOrDeclineBookingResponse
messages.displayName: Confirm Or Decline Booking Response Object

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • SHORT_TEXT - Short text. This is the default value type.
  • LONG_TEXT - Long text
  • CHECK_BOX - a text that represent the check box value: if selected the value is "true", otherwise "false".

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_PLATFORM
  • WEB
  • MOBILE_APP

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED_ACTOR
  • BUSINESS
  • CUSTOMER

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • OWNER_BUSINESS
  • OWNER_CUSTOM
  • CUSTOM

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ANONYMOUS_VISITOR
  • MEMBER
  • WIX_USER
  • APP

The selected payment option. One of the payment options offered by the service. This field is be set when the user selects an option during booking. If left undefined, the payment option is resolved by the service configuration on checkout. Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • OFFLINE
  • ONLINE
  • MEMBERSHIP
  • MEMBERSHIP_OFFLINE - Payment can only be done using a membership and must be manually redeemed in the dashboard by the site owner.

Booking status. Possible values are:
  • CREATED
  • CONFIRMED
  • CANCELED
  • PENDING
  • DECLINED
  • WAITING_LIST

Payment status. Automatically updated when using eCom checkout APIs. Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • NOT_PAID
  • PAID
  • PARTIALLY_PAID - not supported yet.
  • REFUNDED - not supported yet
  • EXEMPT
